projects.title: Summarizer
projects.description: Introducing the article summarizer web application! With just a simple link to any news article, this application uses cutting-edge GPT technology to provide you with a clear and concise summary of the content.

projects.title: Waffle
projects.description: This application mimics the look and feel of the popular social media platform, allowing users to share their thoughts, like, comment and follow each other.

projects.title: CryptoTracker
projects.description: This app fetches real-time data about your favorite cryptocurrencies and presents it in a fun and easy-to-understand format.

projects.title: Metaverse
projects.description: Crafted a responsive Next.js landing with a metaverse theme, utilizing Framer Motion for animations. Translated Figma design into an interface.
